events.text:
To the west of here lies the Marshlands; full of rich soils and treasures.
Our forces are nonexistant there and we've chosen you to go and scout out the area.
There's an orc encampment there that we believe is friendly, go there and earn their trust.
Find whatever is worthwhile and report back to us.
Anything worthwhile to report from the Marshlands?

Welcome back, it's great to see you again. Fill me in with what's happened... <Augustus leans back and listens>
Interesting, your efforts have confirmed what the mages have been sensing.
Well than, I'll Paladin Armond to gather is forces and head to the Marshlands at once.
